comments:
I hope this is the right forum for this issue. If not, please assign it to the 
right team.

Server: 
Concurrent Versions System (CVSNT) 2.0.8 (client/server) 
Copyright (c) 1989-2001 Brian Berliner, david d `zoo' zuhn, 
Jeff Polk, and other authors 
CVSNT version (Jul 24 2003) Copyright (c) 1999-2003 Tony Hoyle and others 

Client: 
Eclipse 3.0 CVS client http://www.cvsnt.org/wiki/CvsClient

When i click on the HEAD, I get the following error 

The server reported an error while performing the "cvs update" command. 
: cvs server: Invalid reply from auth server (username) looking for 
(/repository) 
: cvs [server aborted]: received broken pipe signal 
: cvs server: Invalid reply from auth server (username) looking for (DONE) 

The connection (pserver) works fine in wincvs client. 

Below is the bug log:
--------

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.ui 4 0 Aug 30, 2003 13:07:18.785
!MESSAGE Cannot connect to host

CVS bugs have nothing to do with Stellation.  The proper component is probably 
Platform.Repository, but it should have been reported to platform-cvs-dev.  

I'm sorry I didn't see/respond to this sooner, but given how long ago this 
issue was reported, it doesn't seem appropriate to reassign this item.  If this 
is still an issue, please reopen this bug (or open a new one) and assign it to 
the correct component, with a note to platform-cvs-dev.

FWIW, I've heard that the Eclipse CVS client has real issues with CVSNT, and 
that no remedy is in sight.  However, that information is pretty stale at this 
point.

traces.message: The server reported an error  while performing the "cvs update" command.
